subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] introduction
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1206719053
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Rees,
 
If you like the 469 you will really like the 12-820.  Its a joggers  radio 
and it is smaller.  It has NO CLICKING on the am band and has a nicer  sweep on 
the fm  than the older 12-470's.  AGain it  works the  same as the 12-469 and 
you will need an external speaker as the antenna.
 
Jeff
 
 
In a message dated 3/28/2008 8:27:56 A.M. Central Daylight Time,  
reesclarke_69@... writes:

 
 
 
I like the 12-469, and its super easy to hack.  I hacked the 20-125,  its a 
little harder to hack, and most people in the form is going to  recommend this 
radio, but I just didn't like it.  It has a long  antenna and was hard to get 
reception.  
 
The 12-469 doesn't have a antenna on the outside, and what you do is hold  it 
in your hand.  Your body acts as the antenna, and that's how I got my  best 
reception.  But this is my opinion, go with your gut feeling, if you  get a 
radio you don't like just take it back to the shack.  Act like  nothing is wrong 
with it, and try the other one.

psfponies  <psfponies@...> wrote:

 
 
I am looking at getting either the 12-469 or 20-125. Which would be the  best 
to get for someone who is just starting out. I will be doing the Hack  myself 
with a little help and instructions. I want to get something fairly  easy to 
hack and use for a beginner.
Thanks
Kay

Wiliam Clarke  <reesclarke_69@reesclark> wrote:

Radio Shack FM/AM Radio 12-469 or 20-125

Wiliam Clarke  <reesclarke_69@reesclark> wrote:

 
 
Radio Shack 12-469, 20-125 then you would have to modifiy it.   Some peps 
here can tell you how to do it, or you can go to  ufogeek.com, and watch a video 
on how to do it.
 
Rees

darkstarwolf2002  <darkstarwolf2002@darkstarw> wrote:

 
been camping and reading post

I am the founder Of Trinity  Paranormal's Western Oregon Chapter. I am 
very interested in  experimenting with a box on our investigations.very i
would a  person get one??? yeh probly a lame question lol.
